role.argrole: entity arg0 admits it is not as good as

example.parse: (IP (NP-TPC (NP (PN 其)) (CP-APP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 付款))) (DEC 的)) (ADJP (JJ 爽快)) (NP (NN 风格))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (ADVP (AD 连)) (NP (NN 本地) (NN 白人))) (VP (ADVP (AD 都)) (VP (VV 自叹弗如))))
